passages.text:
Congratulation for defeat that giant bug.
[[It was hard for me.->a1]]
[[I want to fight more.->a1]]
passages.name: Thrid_Level

passages.text:
I know, but you have to be fast in the next challenges.
But before that, why don’t we talk a little, like, to know each other.
[[Sure.->a2]]
[[No...->a2]]
passages.name: a1

passages.text:
So, You said me early that you remember a little about science fiction right?
[[Yeah...and?]]
passages.name: a2

passages.text:
Well, I LOVE science fiction, I mean, You can make so many parameters with reality, but at the same time it’s a wonderful escapism. The best of both.
[[Do you have any favorite?]]
[[...]]
passages.name: Yeah...and?

passages.text:
Well, my favorite of course is Matrix, like, the whole idea of simulation and we, humans, be like the processor of the machines. It’s just amazing.
[[I like Blade Runner]]
[[I like the Asimov stories]]
passages.name: Do you have any favorite?

passages.text:
So, it seams that you are not in the mood today, but I will say anyway, chat with an  excited always help me to talk
[[Whe could try->Do you have any favorite?]]
[[...->Do you have any favorite?]]

The cyberpunk vibe is really breathtaking. 
The whole philosophy behind this story is so fascinating.
[[Everyone should watch->blade]]
[[It’s just too smart for me->blade]]

links.name: It’s just too smart for me

passages.name: I like Blade Runner

passages.text:
I’m Robot is an fantastic Novel, it doesn’t surprises me that in this days we still thinking about their rules.
[[A genius ahead of his time->asimov]]
[[He was very dreamy->asimov]]

links.name: A genius ahead of his time

passages.name: I like the Asimov stories

passages.text:
I know that feeling.
But about the movie, here comes a question: 
We can trust in any of our memories to say if we are humans?
[[I think so.]]
[[I guess no.]]
passages.name: blade

passages.text:
I’m kinda of agree with that.
But here comes a question:
Should anyone smart enough to create robots, be smart enough to make sure that those robots wouldn’t attack their makers?
[[I think so.]]
[[I guess no.]]
passages.name: asimov
